DOC.brief_summary: Background : It show adult Multiple sclerosis ( MS ) less leg strength peer , well impaired balance , lead increase prevalence fall population.The purpose study assess effect 8-weeks aquatic exercise training balance , endurance speed woman MS. Methods : In semi-experimental study , 32 woman clinically-definite relapsing-remittent MS register Isfahan MS association volunteer study . They randomly select aquatic exercise ( n = 17 ) control ( n = 15 ) group . Aquatic exercise group complete 8-week aquatic exercise training program consist three session per week , session last 45 60 minute 50 75 percent maximum heart rate reserve 20-25 degree centigrade 's , whereas control group instruct maintain current lifestyle . The balance angry survey use Berg analyze , speed endurance 6 minute walk test start exercise program 4 week end 8 week analyze . The obtain data 's analyzed use analysis variance repeat measure .
DOC.brief_title: Changes Speed , Endurance Balance Women Patients With Multiple Sclerosis After 4 & 8 Weeks Aquatic Exercise Training
DOC.criteria: All woman diagnosis clinically laboratory support MS , minimum time two year since diagnosis make , relapse within 4 week precede baseline , ability participate regular exercise session . Patients exclude study relapse intervention period , disease prevent participation ( e.g . cardiovascular , respiratory skeletal disease ) .
